monitoring and auditing

Take your website to the next level

Regular website monitoring and auditing is the key to success.

Sitefig regularly checks your website's performance, and functionality to identify potential issue and so you don't have to waste time. This allows you to stay on top of any issues and make necessary updates in a timely manner

Website monitoring and auditing should be done on a regular basis, ideally at least once a month.

By regularly monitoring and auditing your website, you can ensure that it is functioning at its best, is accessible to all users, and is free from errors and compliance issues.

Get compliant, stay compliant

In today's digital age, having a website is not only a necessity for most businesses, but it also comes with legal responsibilities.

Regular website monitoring and auditing can help you stay compliant with industry regulations and best practices.

Sitefig checks the cookies and trackers on your website for to make sure that your DPO stays on top of privacy issues.

Tired of asking the list of cookies?

Despite your DPOs repeated requests, the IT and development teams oftens struggles to provide DPOs with the information they need.

IT is usually too busy with their own projects to take the time to gather the details, and when they do provide the information, it is often incomplete, inaccurate or already outdated.

With Sitefig, Any DPO can log in an get all the necessary data from the dashboard, or download to a spreadsheet.
